short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force enabling for copying on right click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UniCopyHelper extension enables copying on restricted sites.

This extension can copy text, links, and images from any website, making it a time-saver. It also enhances productivity by allowing quick and easy copy-pasting of information, whether you're researching, compiling data, or taking notes.

In fields such as medicine, law, or finance, this extension is beneficial to students, researchers, and professionals. Use UniCopyHelper to copy from any website seamlessly.
